entry.title: New release for Donetick: v0.0.25

entry.title: New release for Donetick: v0.0.27
entry.content:
Changelog

  • Improved Main View for Large Screens (Tablet, Desktop):The main view now includes a side calendar where you can easily see all your scheduled tasks ( both assigned to you and other in your circle)

  • Smart/ Low friction for task Creation: Creating tasks and chores is now effortless. Simply click the input field, type everything in one sentence, and Donetick will attempt parse the details (This feature is still in development and experimental! while it's not yet perfect, it should work well when used in specific scenarios.

  • Updated configuration loading and added support for environment-specific overrides.

  • Added support for creating tasks and chores via the API.

  • Points System Upgrade: Introduced the ability to redeem points!
